mapper.select: SELECT resume_sq, resume_ttl, resume_photo_url, resume_nm, resume_birth_dt, resume_phone_num, resume_email, resume_greeting_txt, CASE WHEN resume_is_notification_yn = 'Y' THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS resume_is_notification_yn, CASE WHEN resume_is_representative_yn = 'Y' THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS resume_is_representative_yn FROM TBL_RESUME_M WHERE resume_sq = #{resumeSq} AND resume_is_deleted_yn = 'N'
SELECT education_school_nm, education_major_nm, education_admission_dt, education_graduation_dt, education_status_cd FROM TBL_RESUME_EDUCATION_S WHERE resume_sq = #{resumeSq}
SELECT career_company_nm, career_department_nm, career_position_nm, career_start_dt, career_end_dt FROM TBL_RESUME_CAREER_S WHERE resume_sq = #{resumeSq}

SELECT s.skill_tag_nm, p.skill_tag_nm AS parent_skill_tag_nm FROM TBL_RESUME_PROJECT_HISTORY_SKILL_TAG_S phs JOIN TBL_SKILL_TAG_C s ON phs.skill_tag_sq = s.skill_tag_sq LEFT JOIN TBL_SKILL_TAG_C p ON s.parent_skill_tag_sq = p.skill_tag_sq WHERE phs.project_history_sq = #{projectHistorySq}
SELECT certification_nm, certification_issuer_nm FROM TBL_RESUME_CERTIFICATION_S WHERE resume_sq = #{resumeSq}
SELECT training_institution_nm, training_program_nm, training_start_dt, training_end_dt FROM TBL_RESUME_TRAINING_HISTORY_S WHERE resume_sq = #{resumeSq}

SELECT a.resume_attachment_sq, f.file_original_nm, f.file_save_nm FROM TBL_RESUME_ATTACHMENT_S a JOIN TBL_COMMON_FILE_S f ON a.file_sq = f.file_sq WHERE a.resume_sq = #{resumeSq} AND f.file_is_deleted_yn = 'N'
SELECT common_code_nm FROM TBL_COMMON_CODE_C WHERE common_code_sq = #{codeSq}

SELECT parent.skill_tag_nm AS parentSkillTagName, child.skill_tag_nm AS skillTagName FROM TBL_RESUME_PROJECT_HISTORY_SKILL_TAG_S child LEFT JOIN TBL_SKILL_TAG_C parent ON child.parent_skill_tag_sq = parent.skill_tag_sq WHERE child.project_history_sq = #{projectHistorySq}
